entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Alberni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Alberni 10:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. 60 percent chance of flurries near Gold River this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. 60 percent chance of flurries near Gold River this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
